title: NCLAT stays NCLT order directing RattanIndia Finance to appoint JV nominee as CFO - The Financial Express
content: NCLAT stays NCLT order directing RattanIndia Finance to appoint JV nominee as CFO  The Financial Express
description: LSF 10 Rose Investments, a subsidiary of US-based private equity firm Lone Star Funds (LSF), holds 50 per cent shareholding in RattanIndia Finance (RF), a non-banking finance company.
